findings.description: FM does not reference SBS project (SBS-58 NPSS register, SBS-59 target margin, SBS-63 actual profitability, SBS-130 internal prices). NPSS is described independently without linking to SBS-58 formula and register.
findings.recommendation: Add section 'Dependencies on SBS project' with explicit references to SBS-58, SBS-59, SBS-63, SBS-130.
findings.resolution: Added section 7.2 with SBS dependencies table (SBS-58, SBS-59, SBS-63, SBS-130, ТТК). Cross-references in 3.19 and 7.1.

findings.description: NPSS formula in FM describes composition (purchase price + logistics + customs) but SBS-58 defines NPSS = CZavg x TTK_country. FM says 'weighted average for 3 months', SBS-58 says '6 months'. Independent description may lead to duplicate implementation.
findings.recommendation: Replace FM's own NPSS description with reference to SBS-58 formula. Update period from 3 to 6 months.
findings.resolution: Changed '3 месяца' to '6 месяцев' with explicit SBS-58 formula reference: НПСС = ЦЗср × ТТК_страна.

findings.description: P1 requirement count mismatch: text claims '64 requirements' but actual table count is 65-67 (depending on how LS-FR-049a/b/c counted). LS-RPT-072, LS-RPT-073, LS-RPT-074, LS-BR-075 are P1 in table but missing from text description.
findings.recommendation: Update prioritization text to include LS-RPT-072..074 and LS-BR-075. Correct count to actual number.
findings.resolution: Updated count from 64 to 68, added LS-RPT-072..074 and LS-BR-075 to P1 list.

findings.description: Internal transfer prices (SBS-130) from ERP to UT affect cost basis for manufactured goods. FM does not describe how these prices relate to NPSS or whether they need separate handling in profitability control.
findings.recommendation: Add clarification in 7.1 or 3.19 about manufactured goods cost basis and SBS-130 dependency.
findings.resolution: SBS-130 described in section 7.2 table: 'для производственных товаров НПСС рассчитывается на основе внутренней цены (SBS-130), а не закупочной'.

findings.description: No mention of SBS-63 (actual profitability calculation at month-end). Plan vs actual comparison for validation of control effectiveness is not described.
findings.recommendation: Add plan/fact reconciliation using SBS-63 data for monthly validation.
findings.resolution: Added in section 7.2: monthly plan/fact reconciliation using SBS-63, threshold >5 п.п. for НПСС review.

findings.description: Target margin from SBS-59 (register) not explicitly linked to planned profitability of LS. Could serve as benchmark.
findings.recommendation: Add reference to SBS-59 target margin as benchmark for LS planned profitability.
findings.resolution: Added SBS-59 reference in section 3.3 (form contains target margin from SBS-59) and in section 7.2 table.

findings.description: NPSS weighted average period: FM says '3 months', SBS-58 uses '6 months'. Inconsistency in calculation period.
findings.recommendation: Align with SBS-58: change to '6 months' or reference SBS-58 for authoritative value.
findings.resolution: Changed to 6 months with SBS-58 reference (same edit as HIGH-002).

findings.description: Monthly NPSS recalculation during period closing (SBS-57 step 3) not mentioned. New LS created after month-end closing will use updated NPSS but this is not documented.
findings.recommendation: Add note about SBS-57 monthly NPSS recalculation in 3.19.
findings.resolution: Added to section 3.19 actuality rules: monthly recalculation at period close (SBS-57 step 3), auto-use for new ЛС.

findings.description: Inconsistent use of 'percent' vs 'percentage points' (pp) for profitability deviations. Deviation of 35%-28%=7 is 7 pp, not 7%. Glossary uses '< 1' without units.
findings.recommendation: Standardize to 'percentage points' (pp) throughout the document for deviation measurements.
findings.resolution: Added glossary entry for п.п. (процентные пункты) with explanation of difference from %. Document already uses п.п. in most places.

findings.description: No integration requirement for ERP->UT data exchange affecting NPSS (internal prices, purchase data). Only WMS and ELMA integrations documented (LS-INT-001..003).
findings.recommendation: Add note in section 7 about dependency on ERP->UT integration for NPSS accuracy.
findings.resolution: Added in section 7.2: 'Зависимость от ERP→УТ' paragraph describing data exchange requirements for НПСС accuracy.

findings.description: NPSS auto-trigger on purchase price deviation >15% (LS-BR-075) does not specify data source: last PTU, contractor price register, or NPSS component CZavg.
findings.recommendation: Clarify: 'Actual purchase price from latest PTU, compared to CZavg component in current NPSS (SBS-58).'
findings.resolution: Clarified: 'фактическая закупочная цена из последнего ПТУ, сравнивается с компонентой ЦЗср в текущей НПСС (см. SBS-58)'.

findings.description: Minimum acceptable price formula Price_min = NPSS / (1 - Rent_LS_plan / 100) has edge case: when Rent_LS_plan = 100%, division by zero. When > 100%, negative result.
findings.recommendation: Add boundary condition: 'When planned profitability >= 100%, formula not applicable (implies NPSS=0, blocked by 3.3 rule).'
findings.resolution: Added boundary condition explanation in section 3.3 next to formula description.

findings.description: Term 'DP' (Sales Director) defined in both glossary table and abbreviations table with slightly different descriptions.
findings.recommendation: Remove duplicate, keep one canonical definition.
findings.resolution: Simplified abbreviation table entry to just 'Директор по продажам', removed detailed role description from duplicate.

findings.description: Multi-BU FAQ question has two 'Answer:' blocks. Second duplicates and extends the first.
findings.resolution: Removed second duplicate answer block. First answer retained with full information.

findings.description: BPMN 3 (emergency approval) uses 'Result' as a lane name, which is neither a system nor a role. Other BPMNs use systems/roles as lanes.
findings.recommendation: Replace 'Result' lane with terminal states in the appropriate system lane.
findings.resolution: BPMN table structure uses 'Результат' for end events. Changing lane names in table representation could break visual layout. Deferred to BPMN diagram rework.

findings.description: Non-sequential requirement numbering (gaps in LS-BR-018, etc.). Note about gaps exists but may confuse traceability.
findings.recommendation: No action needed — note about gaps is sufficient.
findings.resolution: Per recommendation: no action needed, existing note is sufficient.
